response.original_title: Death by Chocolate: West Edmonton Shopping Mall (1986-05)
response.overview: Produced by Graham at the Banff Centre in Canada, DEATH BY CHOCOLATE draws on nearly twenty years’ worth of footage shot in the bizarre yet familiar arena of the shopping mall. The resulting work provides a coldly beautiful view of mall culture: its architecture, its consumer public, and its unique aesthetic world. This work also provides a corollary to Graham’s own prodigious writings and projects on the public spaces of corporate capitalism.
response.title: Death by Chocolate: West Edmonton Shopping Mall (1986-05)
